overview: 1976 was an important year for China - Chairman Mao dies and the Cultural Revolution ends. In Chengdu, five young women find 2 Yuan on the street. They treat themselves to ice cream and decide to take a photo in a studio. Every 10 years they take another photo in the same position. Although their lives have taken different routes and their political views don't align, they remain close friends.
title: Mao's Ice Cream
